description: Alto`s classmate and friendly rival. He is an excellent marksman, and his motto is to always acquire his targets, be it an enemy or a womanâ€”maintaining his reputation as a considerable ladies` man. He is the originator of Alto`s nickname, "Alto Hime" (Princess Alto). Aside from leading a normal school life, he is also the 2nd Lieutenant of the S.M.S. Skull Squadron and pilots a blue VF-25G (gunner/sniper version). He initially expresses doubt over Alto joining the Skull Squadron, but later accepts him.
name: Mikhail Blanc
